entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening then clear. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 3 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 March 2023
